name: WAV
description:
Platformer game but you control the GRAVITY! In total, there are 24 levels.

Controls:

  • SPACEBAR - Jump
  • R - Restart

Made in 72 hours for Geo Game Jam 2022.

Credits:

  • Game Ideas - RedOrange (https://redorange.itch.io/) & dVIN*C_II (https://dvinc-ii.itch.io/)
  • Coding - RedOrange
  • Art & Music - dVIN*C_II
